pullRequest.title: Regression tests for CustomStudyDialog JSON output
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adds more regression cover.
Fragment testing is much more complex than I'd expected, especially as we use the containing activity to access the collection.
At some point in the future™️ we should move to a more self-contained and testable model.
Fixes #6289

commit.message:
Regression Test: JSONObject

NULL was previously assigned to the null value, which had semantic
differences.

     testImplementation "org.robolectric:robolectric:4.3.1"
     testImplementation 'androidx.test:core:1.2.0'
     testImplementation 'androidx.test.ext:junit:1.1.1'

commit.message:
Enable MultiDex support

Adding in the fragment testing library will need it.

This also adds in a custom unit test runner
as MultiDex support for < Android 21 appears to be
insufficient

Add regression test for CUSTOM_STUDY_AHEAD

Regression test for #6289
